meanings.definition: The quality or state of being unusual.
meanings.sent1: The unusualness of the situation caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: Her outfit stood out because of its unusualness.
meanings.sent3: The unusualness of the cat wearing a hat made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The unusualness of the rainbow at midnight was truly magical.
meanings.sent5: The unusualness of the tree growing upside down was unforgettable.

meanings.definition: The condition of being out of the ordinary.
meanings.sent1: The unusualness of the event made it memorable.
meanings.sent2: The town's unusualness was evident in its colorful houses.
meanings.sent3: The unusualness of the talking dog surprised everyone at the party.
meanings.sent4: The unusualness of the snow in summer was like a dream.
meanings.sent5: The unusualness of the glowing rocks in the cave was fascinating.
